title: The Galaxy Z Fold 4 might also come with an integrated S Pen, leaving no scope for a Note revival
content:
Although Samsung added S Pen support to the Galaxy Z Fold lineup with the Galaxy Z Fold 3 last year, the company didn’t provide an integrated S Pen slot on the device. As a result, users had to buy Samsung’s official S Pen case to carry around the S Pen Fold Edition with their devices.

The post The Galaxy Z Fold 4 might also come with an integrated S Pen, leaving no scope for a Note revival appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A new leak about the upcoming Galaxy Z Fold 4 reveals that it might come with an integrated S Pen. Read on to learn more.
